abstract: Herman Cain's $2.8 million raised is only slightly larger than the $2.5 million that he raised in the spring, before he had the name recognition and momentum that have come his way in recent weeks.
snippet: Herman Cain's $2.8 million raised is only slightly larger than the $2.5 million that he raised in the spring, before he had the name recognition and momentum that have come his way in recent weeks.
lead_paragraph: Herman Cain, the former restaurant executive, raised $2.8 million dollars for his presidential campaign during the last three months and has no debt, the campaign announced Saturday morning, calling the summer fund-raising period "very successful."
